definition: to beg for mercy/to ask for forgiveness
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although

sentences.english: She tickled him into saying yes.
sentences.chinese: 呵癢使他癢得討饒說是。

sentences.english: Until the lane Mo jeans aloud of ask for forgiveness, he just release her.
sentences.chinese: 直到弄墨氣喘吁吁的討饒，他才放開她。

sentences.english: BAT who fell upon the ground and was caught by a Weasel pleaded to be spared his life.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠掉落在地上，被黃鼠狼叼去，他懇討饒命。

sentences.english: The man on the pole yields to Li Gungun.
sentences.chinese: 杆上男人向李滾滾討饒了。

sentences.english: The man on the pole yields.
sentences.chinese: 杆上男人向李滾滾討饒了。

sentences.english: Even it he gets down on his knees, I won't forgive him.
sentences.chinese: 即使他跪地討饒，我也不能原諒他。
